title: newnft
author: newnft
content: Need a website or desktop application built? I provide full-stack web and desktop software development services. I can develop: Websites and web applications (both static and dynamic). Desktop applications (both with graphical interfaces and CLI-based). Scrapers, bots and other automation utilities. Userscripts and browser extensions.…and much more.javscript/php/python etci can make nft website .. mint contract etc.PS : i cannot handle artistic work on design nft characters , I handle only programing stuff

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Hello, And Welcome to the forum.It would be useful for you to find possible costumers around here if you showed some of your portfolio/previous work to us all, just an advice to make your offer more appealing it would help with the fact you seem to be new around here.If you can't immediately show us or make reference to the websites you have already helped to code/build, you should get permission from your former employers so you can do so.Good luck, and read the rules.

comments.author: newnft
comments.body: thanks for reply i dont post my client works in public who wants i can send on privatebless you
